message_text:
*Take a Pause With @fields.child_nicknameren*

Take a pause with your children. This helps them deal with stress in a healthy way!
⏰ You could take a pause together at any time, or you could try at a specific time like before meals or bedtime.
👂 Sit down together and close your eyes. Listen to your breath as it goes in and out. Notice how you feel. 
⭐ Take 5 more deep breaths.

*Take a Pause With your children*

Take a pause with your children. This helps them deal with stress in a healthy way!
⏰ You could take a pause together at any time, or you could try at a specific time like before meals or bedtime.
👂 Sit down together and close your eyes. Listen to your breath as it goes in and out. Notice how you feel. 
⭐ Take 5 more deep breaths.

👀 When you are ready, open your eyes again. Do you feel any different? 
⏸ Ask your children what it was like to take a pause. Listen and accept whatever they say about it.
